scenario.title: NHSERS-111_S030_Note3 | 2nd UBRN field will autotab to when patient enters 4 digits with javascript enabled

examples.step: Given browser is open
When I navigate to <pageName> page
Then the current page has title of "<pageTitle>" on the <pageName> page
Given the current page has title of "<pageTitle>" on the Login page
!-- Given a Patient User has <UBRN>
!-- And has javascript enabled
When I enter "0000" in the ubrnField1 textbox on the Login page
!-- Then the culrsor will autotab to the next field
Then the cursor will autotab to the ubrnField2 field on the Login page
!-- Given a Patient User has <UBRN>
!-- And has javascript enabled
!-- When they enter the second 4 digits of their UBRN
Given the cursor will autotab to the ubrnField2 field on the Login page
When I enter "0000" in the ubrnField2 textbox on the Login page
!-- Then the cursor will autotab to the 3rd UBRN field
Then the cursor will autotab to the ubrnField3 field on the Login page
Given browser is open
When I navigate to Login page
Then the current page has title of "e-Referral Service" on the Login page
Given the current page has title of "e-Referral Service" on the Login page
!-- Given a Patient User has <UBRN>
!-- And has javascript enabled
When I enter "0000" in the ubrnField1 textbox on the Login page
!-- Then the culrsor will autotab to the next field
Then the cursor will autotab to the ubrnField2 field on the Login page
!-- Given a Patient User has <UBRN>
!-- And has javascript enabled
!-- When they enter the second 4 digits of their UBRN
Given the cursor will autotab to the ubrnField2 field on the Login page
When I enter "0000" in the ubrnField2 textbox on the Login page
!-- Then the cursor will autotab to the 3rd UBRN field
Then the cursor will autotab to the ubrnField3 field on the Login page
